categories: Category:The Official Star Wars Fact File (2013)

nodes.text: The Official Star Wars Fact File (2013)
The Official Star Wars Fact File is a series of magazines published by De Agostini. Its format is similar to the original series that ran from 2002 to 2005.
The series' initial run started in April 2013 and lasted for five issues, released weekly. The series was relaunched in January 2014, with 120 issues planned, to be released each Wednesday.

The Star Wars Fact File is an amazing new work of reference for the world of Star Wars. Every week, collect a new set of files to store in your binders, building into the largest and most complete Star Wars guide ever published.
The content of each issue is split into six categories:
